div.p: Phasing relationships for insolation and Great Basin Paleoclimate. ( A) Is 65°N June 21 insolation; ( B) is Leviathan chronology and band-pass filter; U-series ages are shown in blue for Leviathan chronology. Yellow and blue backgrounds are marine isotope stages 1–6. Circles are ages of peaks and troughs in band-pass filtered data. Stars indicate TII and inceptions (see text).
